articles.author: SYLVIE CORBET
articles.title: Macron puts trade and Ukraine as top priorities as China's Xi opens European visit in France - The Associated Press
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron has put trade disputes and Ukraine-related diplomatic efforts at the top of the agenda for talks with visiting Chinese President Xi Jinping. Macron said the talks included lifting immediate tariff threats on French Cognac expo…
articles.content: PARIS (AP) French President Emmanuel Macron held talks with Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Monday that focused on trade disputes including lifting immediate tariff threats on Cognac exports and Ukraine… [+5360 chars]

articles.author: Eva Hartog
articles.title: Putin's inauguration set to kickstart Kremlin reshuffle - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The aftermath of the ritual will show how far Russia’s leader is willing to go in changing his aging old guard.
articles.content:
On the other, he has relied on loyal technocrats such as Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin and Russias Central Bank Chief Elvira Nabiullina to keep the countrys economy afloat.
